title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah: Key Terrorist Cells Targeted in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Two rapid closures of the loop: The IDF attacked terrorist cells located in Hezbollah military structures.

Forces from the fire brigade of Division 91 identified a terrorist entering a military structure where additional terrorists were present, in the area of Houla in southern Lebanon. Shortly after the identification, air force fighter jets attacked the structure where the terrorists were located.

In addition, IDF forces identified a terrorist operating in a military building of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the area of Kfar Kila, and shortly thereafter, the forces attacked the structure where the terrorist was located.

Attached is documentation of the attack: https://bit.ly/3W4lwHa
